00001 #ifndef WIN32
00002    #include <cstdlib>
00003    #include <netdb.h>
00004 #else
00005    #include <winsock2.h>
00006    #include <ws2tcpip.h>
00007 #endif
00008 #include <fstream>
00009 #include <iostream>
00010 #include <cstring>
00011 #include <udt.h>
00012 
00013 using namespace std;
00014 
00015 #ifndef WIN32
00016 void* sendfile(void*);
00017 #else
00018 DWORD WINAPI sendfile(LPVOID);
00019 #endif
00020 
00021 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00022 {
00023    //usage: sendfile [server_port]
00024    if ((2 < argc) || ((2 == argc) && (0 == atoi(argv[1]))))
00025    {
00026       cout << "usage: sendfile [server_port]" << endl;
00027       return 0;
00028    }
00029 
00030    // use this function to initialize the UDT library
00031    UDT::startup();
00032 
00033    UDTSOCKET serv = UDT::socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
00034 
00035    // Windows UDP issue
00036    // For better performance, modify HKLM\System\CurrentControlSet\Services\Afd\Parameters\FastSendDatagramThreshold
00037 #ifdef WIN32
00038    int mss = 1052;
00039    UDT::setsockopt(serv, 0, UDT_MSS, &mss, sizeof(int));
00040 #endif
00041 
00042    int port = 9000;
00043    if (2 == argc)
00044       port = atoi(argv[1]);
00045 
00046    sockaddr_in my_addr;
00047    my_addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00048    my_addr.sin_port = htons(port);
00049    my_addr.sin_addr.s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
00050    memset(&(my_addr.sin_zero), '\0', 8);
00051 
00052    if (UDT::ERROR == UDT::bind(serv, (sockaddr*)&my_addr, sizeof(my_addr)))
00053    {
00054       cout << "bind: " << UDT::getlasterror().getErrorMessage() << endl;
00055       return 0;
00056    }
00057 
00058    cout << "server is ready at port: " << port << endl;
00059 
00060    UDT::listen(serv, 10);
00061 
00062    sockaddr_storage clientaddr;
00063    int addrlen = sizeof(clientaddr);
00064 
00065    UDTSOCKET fhandle;
00066 
00067    while (true)
00068    {
00069       if (UDT::INVALID_SOCK == (fhandle = UDT::accept(serv, (sockaddr*)&clientaddr, &addrlen)))
00070       {
00071          cout << "accept: " << UDT::getlasterror().getErrorMessage() << endl;
00072          return 0;
00073       }
00074 
00075       char clienthost[NI_MAXHOST];
00076       char clientservice[NI_MAXSERV];
00077       getnameinfo((sockaddr *)&clientaddr, addrlen, clienthost, sizeof(clienthost), clientservice, sizeof(clientservice), NI_NUMERICHOST|NI_NUMERICSERV);
00078       cout << "new connection: " << clienthost << ":" << clientservice << endl;
00079 
00080       #ifndef WIN32
00081          pthread_t filethread;
00082          pthread_create(&filethread, NULL, sendfile, new UDTSOCKET(fhandle));
00083          pthread_detach(filethread);
00084       #else
00085          CreateThread(NULL, 0, sendfile, new UDTSOCKET(fhandle), 0, NULL);
00086       #endif
00087    }
00088 
00089    UDT::close(serv);
00090 
00091    // use this function to release the UDT library
00092    UDT::cleanup();
00093 
00094    return 1;
00095 }
00096 
00097 #ifndef WIN32
00098 void* sendfile(void* usocket)
00099 #else
00100 DWORD WINAPI sendfile(LPVOID usocket)
00101 #endif
00102 {
00103    UDTSOCKET fhandle = *(UDTSOCKET*)usocket;
00104    delete (UDTSOCKET*)usocket;
00105 
00106    // aquiring file name information from client
00107    char file[1024];
00108    int len;
00109 
00110    if (UDT::ERROR == UDT::recv(fhandle, (char*)&len, sizeof(int), 0))
00111    {
00112       cout << "recv: " << UDT::getlasterror().getErrorMessage() << endl;
00113       return 0;
00114    }
00115 
00116    if (UDT::ERROR == UDT::recv(fhandle, file, len, 0))
00117    {
00118       cout << "recv: " << UDT::getlasterror().getErrorMessage() << endl;
00119       return 0;
00120    }
00121    file[len] = '\0';
00122 
00123    // open the file
00124    fstream ifs(file, ios::in | ios::binary);
00125 
00126    ifs.seekg(0, ios::end);
00127    int64_t size = ifs.tellg();
00128    ifs.seekg(0, ios::beg);
00129 
00130    // send file size information
00131    if (UDT::ERROR == UDT::send(fhandle, (char*)&size, sizeof(int64_t), 0))
00132    {
00133       cout << "send: " << UDT::getlasterror().getErrorMessage() << endl;
00134       return 0;
00135    }
00136 
00137    UDT::TRACEINFO trace;
00138    UDT::perfmon(fhandle, &trace);
00139 
00140    // send the file
00141    int64_t offset = 0;
00142    if (UDT::ERROR == UDT::sendfile(fhandle, ifs, offset, size))
00143    {
00144       cout << "sendfile: " << UDT::getlasterror().getErrorMessage() << endl;
00145       return 0;
00146    }
00147 
00148    UDT::perfmon(fhandle, &trace);
00149    cout << "speed = " << trace.mbpsSendRate << "Mbits/sec" << endl;
00150 
00151    UDT::close(fhandle);
00152 
00153    ifs.close();
00154 
00155    #ifndef WIN32
00156       return NULL;
00157    #else
00158       return 0;
00159    #endif
00160 }
